Benefits

Once per round, if the character reduces a creature to 0 CHP or less, the character may immediately make a melee attack against another creature within reach for no Combat Points. The character may move up to 10â€™ before making this extra attack, but the character must have enough Combat Points to move this distance, and the character must move directly towards another enemy creature to take this attack. The extra attack is with the same weapon as the attack that dropped the previous creature.
system.summary: Free attack after dropping target to 0 CHP
